        public void buy()
        Prompts user for type of investment then symbol, quantity, and price. Creates new investment and adds to appropriate list

      • guiBuy

                         java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String symbol,
                         int quantity,
                         double price)
        Does the functionality for the buy gui interface
        Parameters:
        investmentType - the inputted investment type
        name - the inputted name
        symbol - the inputted symbol
        quantity - the inputted quantity
        price - the inputted price
        Returns:
        an Investment

      • sell

        public void sell()
        Prompts user for symbol, quantity, and price. removes quantity sold and updates price.

        For each investment, prompts user to update price.
